trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스의 종료와 관련 된 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs 런타임 추적 인프라가 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 될 때 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>연결 된 워크플로 인스턴스가 포함 됩니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>에 대해 구성 된 한 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, 워크플로 추적 인프라 설정에 TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>를 추적 서비스로 보내는.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur.
trans-unit.target: 세 가지 방법 중 하나에 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 될 수 있습니다: 호스트를 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>활동이 워크플로 인스턴스 내부에서 호출 또는 처리 되지 않은 예외가 발생할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated by the host or a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: 호스트에서 워크플로가 종료 되는 경우 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>활동, 런타임 추적 인프라 집합 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>에 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>있는 해당 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>속성이 종료 이유에 대 한 설명으로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 추적 인프라가 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> 처리 되지 않은 예외를 전달 처리 되지 않은 예외로 인해 워크플로가 종료 되는 경우

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> 정보를 전달 하는 런타임 추적 서비스가 의해서만 사용 됩니다

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되 게 한 예외를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, Exception contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: 처리 되지 않은 예외로 인해 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되 면 처리 되지 않은 예외가 포함 하는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, Exception contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: 한 호스트 호출이 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>작업 예외에 포함 되어는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>있는 해당 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>속성이 종료 이유에 대 한 설명으로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; if the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이 설명을 제공 호스트가 워크플로 인스턴스를 종료 하는 경우는 `string` <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에서 설명을 제공는,</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> 워크플로 인스턴스가 종료 되는 경우</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 매개 변수

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
